title: mOhana shrngAra
sahitya:
mOhana shrngAra mUrti ranganukku Ayiram manmatar
 IDAvarO mana mOhana shrngAra mUrti paccai mukhil 


anupallavi

  vaNNan kaNNan mukha malar maduvuNNum rAdhai kaNgaL


caraNam    pAghana mozhi amudAlE madhura idazhin kuzhalin ishaiyAlE manam paravasham
 aDaindu ulagai marandu paramAnandham aDaindu iraNDarak-kalandhAra jagan
